name: Sniper 3D - Assassin Shooter At War Edition
name_original: Sniper 3D - Assassin Shooter At War Edition
description:
** FAST ADRENALINE PUMPING SNIPER GAME! **
** GORGEOUS HIGH QUALITY 3D GRAPHICS **

Your mission is simple. Wipe out the terrorist group holding a group people hostage, and bring the hostages back home. Featuring incredible graphics and a super easy game play, you won't be able to put this sniper game down!

FEATURES

- Heart pumping sniper game!
- Super easy controls! Just "tap" to shoot!
- Original sound effects and soundtrack.
- Lots of non-stop action!
- Game center support.

** WARNING! - THIS GAME CONTAINS EXCESSIVE VIOLENCE AND IS NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN. YOU MUST BE 17+ TO DOWNLOAD THIS APP. **
